pages.text: $(#4096ff)$(bold)Ice dragons$() can spawn in the following biomes:$(br2)Snowy Tundra$(br)Snowy Mountains$(br)Ice Spikes$(br)Snowy Taiga$(br)Snowy Taiga Mountains$(br)Snowy Taiga Hills$(br)Giant Tree Taiga$(br)Giant Tree Taiga Hills$(br)Gravelly Mountains$(br)Modified Gravelly Mountains$(br)Snowy Coniferous Forest

$(br)Snowy Fir Clearing$(br)Snowy Maple Forest$(br)Twilight Valley$(br)Twilight Valley Hills$(br)Seasonal Deciduous Forest$(br)Seasonal Deciduous Forest Hills$(br)Snowy Deciduous Forest$(br)Snowy Deciduous Forest Hills
